> I imagine the data is available for only the lifetime of the JVM.

JB's i=
magination parallels reality.  Java system properties only exist
within the=
 context of a single JVM instance, just like how environment
variables only=
 exist within a single process (and subprocesses of that
process).

If you =
want to play with running all your tests in the same JVM, look
into the "fo=
rk" and "forkmode" parameters to the junit ant task.


Todd.
